bibl.title: Were the Oases Used as an Isolation and Quarantine Zone in the Ptolemaic Period?
bibl.note: EL-SHAHAT Mona M., Were the Oases Used as an Isolation and Quarantine Zone in the Ptolemaic Period?

Nicola BONACASA, Maria CASINI e Ahmed ETMAN (a cura di), Maria CASINI (redazione), The Culture of the Oasis from the Antiquity to the Modern Age. El Kharga, 22-27 October 1998. IV Italo-Egyptian Forum. [Atti del IV Congresso Internazionale Italo-Egiziano] (Cairo, s.d.) pp. 245-253.
